column5: A bunch of us Northern OFC'rs are looking at getting together for a Winter GTG on Nip ... probably on Callander Bay... I have permission from my wife to bring the 30' camper out onto the ice for a few days.  Who's in ?   let me know by posting and I will try to get the ball rolling ......  Randy
If I'm not working you can count me in for sure.
Probably  sometime in February....I'll need at least 15" of ice for the Mallard.  Randy

Randy, I'm in 100%. I had a few responses via P.M.s. The consensus is that middle - end of Jan would be best with best fishing. Even without the Mallard we could have a blast. You and I will sit down for a coffee or a beer sometime soon and sort out some details.
I've always wanted to hit Nip in the winter.  Pick a date, chances are I'm in!
sounds good to me!!!  any more Northerners want to sit down over a few beers/coffee and discuss this?  Randy
Sounds good to me Randy, i'm only 2 hrs away, and a fishing trip in the middle of winter is all good.
